title: Finally got my Battlecast Koggles!
body:
Thread I made 1 year ago when the skin was teased:
http://i.gyazo.com/7e8b082ec9287c6a83772329c4e5a1c8.png

TODAY:
http://i.gyazo.com/1d75b0d0d9f7054256c7c488072ef276.png

replies.body:
You make it sound like riot weren't already planning to make a battlecast skin for kog.

They planned to make a battlecast skin for kog before battlecast cho'gath was even released.

> You make it sound like riot weren't already planning to make a battlecast skin for kog.
> 
> They planned to make a battlecast skin for kog before battlecast cho'gath was even released.

I make it sound like it finally had a concept teased back in 2013 and then a year later I actually got to buy a skin I'd been hoping for since S2.
Awesome! It is a good skin, but I was more excited for Battlecast Alpha Skarner!
Kog'Maw has so much skins, why the %%%% did he get another one? %%%%ing show some love to other ADC's. Or some %%%%ing champs with 2 skins still, 9 months later.

It's kinda just one of those skins that Riot has to eventually make for champions that share a mutual theme (i.e. being from the Void/being a member of the Demacian Elite/being part of the Kinkou Order etc).
